name: Bagel and cream cheese
details: A bagel and cream cheese is a common food pairing in American cuisine

name: Breakfast sandwich
details: A breakfast sandwich is any sandwich filled with foods associated with the breakfast meal.

name: Eggs Benedict
details: Eggs Benedict is a common American breakfast or brunch dish, consisting of two halves of an English muffin, each topped with Canadian bacon, a poached egg, and hollandaise sauce.

details: It includes soft scrambled eggs, veggies, and cheddar cheese! ... Add your eggs (1 1/2 eggs per sandwich) to the toasted croissant bottoms

name: Full Breakfast Fried Egg Toast Brunch
details: Full English breakfasts contain: sausages, back bacon, eggs, tomatoes, mushrooms, ... The bread has to be FRIED, either with butter or oil.
